name: Nejc Blaznik
profile:
Experimental physicist with a strong background in quantum mechanics, optics and data-driven imaging, combining hands-on laboratory expertise with advanced computational analysis.

Experienced in designing and building complex experimental systems, developing new optical and data-processing techniques, and solving problems under demanding conditions. Driven by curiosity and a wish to uncover and engineer new physical phenomena, I aim to bridge fundamental understanding with practical innovation, turning experimental precision and computational insight into new technological possibilities.
